publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7605.2 Robert Brown: Antisocial Behaviour Frameworkâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7605) in the name of Fergus Ewing, insert at end "; believes that local policing is key to community safety; notes the work underway through the Sustainable Policing Project on protecting frontline policing and the delivery of outcomes for communities, and believes that community safety is unlikely to benefit from the establishment of a single Scottish police force."
